summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1220, for the improvement of 23rd Avenue North and certain parts of certain other streets, avenues, and alleys and rights of way therein named and described, in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein, upon and along sewers, sub-sewers, and a septic tank or septic tanks, together with all necessary wyes, manholes catch basins, flush tanks, structures, material and appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 13415 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
